name: Office Madness (Cookie_CHR)
description:
Life in the office can be stressful: somehow, it always seems like everything will collapse if you just take a minute of pause.  

In this warioware type game, every 10 seconds one of your three colleagues will call you and propose you a minigame. If everybody needs your help at the same time for more than 10 seconds, you lose.  

Made for Ludum Dare 51
